section.name: What's this?
section.p: This tool dumps all the sub-projects of a given project to stdout.

section.name: How to use
section.pre:
$ java -jar javaNetTasks.jar listSubProjects [-r] <projectName>
e.g., $ java -jar javaNetTasks.jar listSubProjects java-ws-xml
section.p: With the '-r' option, the tool will recursively list all the descendant projects of the specified project. The listing will not include the specified project itself.
